name: Nutuk
author: Mustafa Kemal Atatürk
description: Hey Turkish youth! Your first duty is to ensure Turkish independence, Turkish To preserve and defend the Republic forever.

name: Hayvan Çiftliği
author: George Orwell
description: Animal Farm is George Orwell's second famous novel, one of the modern classics, and a striking political satire. This novel, one of the best system criticisms ever written, reveals how a revolution aimed at freedom can evolve into one-man rule. George Orwell's allegory remains relevant today in every situation and place where freedom is attacked.

name: Zengin Baba Yoksul Baba
author: Robert T. Kiyosaki
description: It reminds us why we shouldn't trust what school systems teach us about money, and explains why this important skill is more important today than ever. It explains what you should teach your children about money so they can prepare themselves for the challenges and opportunities of today's world and live the rich lives they deserve.

name: Açlık Oyunları 3 - Alaycı Kuş
author: Suzanne Collins
description: If we burn, you will burn with us!

name: Hep Hayır! Diyen Çocuk
author: Charlie Griffin
description: Always no!' Berk, who does not like the rules very much, one day says No to everything! he started to say. No to getting up and getting dressed! No to bath fun! No to fine foods! An idea came to her mother's mind. Let's see, always No! Will Diyen be able to convince Berk?

name: Avcunuzdaki Kelebek
author: Ahmet Şerif İzgören
description: Congratulations! I cannot say anything else very clearly. I think I may have broken a speed reading record. How can you give so many messages that are so emotionally charged, that reveal so many facts, and that there is still hope, all at once? I really congratulate you.

name: Kumarbaz
author: Fyodor Mihayloviç Dostoyevski
description: What am I right now? A big fat zero. What can I be tomorrow? None. I die tomorrow, I can be resurrected and start a new life!.. I will save the person inside me before it is completely destroyed.

name: Utangaç Ayı Monti
author: Duncan Beedie
description: Once upon a time there was a bear and his name was Monti. He loved to stare and watch everyone. Actually, Monti Bear didn't want to be rude, but he was so curious that he couldn't hold himself back...

name: Kara Delikler
author: Stephen Hawking
description: At the BBC Reith lectures of 2016, Stephen Hawking accepted the truly formidable challenge of conveying a lifetime's worth of research in fifteen minutes. In these very short lectures, Hawking reveals the mysteries of the universe and emphasizes that we can access the secrets of spacetime if we understand black holes.

name: İnsan Geleceğini Nasıl Kurar?
author: İlber Ortaylı
description: How Does Man Build His Future? From an intellectual who considers it his duty to share his life experience, İlber Hodja, a guide for readers to open a path, build a path, build oneself and raise the society. With the inspiration of sages such as Plato, Seneca, Cicero, Farabi and the questions of Yenal Bilgici...

name: Hayvanlardan Tanrılara - Sapiens
author: Yuval Noah Harari
description: Sapiens, From Animals to Gods, written by Israeli Writer and History Professor Yuval Noah Harari, is among the most popular books of recent years. The work, which deals with the historical journey of man from the beginning to the present, details all the conditions that created today in the light of scientific and social sciences.

name: Savaş ve Barış
author: Tolstoy
description: If everyone fought only for their own beliefs, there would be no war...
